Reviews.Title: “Ok, not as good as I expected”
Reviews.Author: begUk
Reviews.Content: mentioned expecting bit 150euro day hotel positives locations vaporeto station 20 minutes hotel door clean ish breakfast served selfserved negatives visited february heating required using noisy air conditioning device found hard sleep constant noise coming air conditioning device head floor cold concrete carpets boots bathroom blankets looked tatty sheets hope washed customer stayed 3 days days breakfast exactly cold bit boring paid canal view hardly canal worth pay

Reviews.Title: “A Small Hotel right by the Canal”
Reviews.Author: Kathryn150
Reviews.Content: hotel situated canal 2 vaporetto stops santa lucia railway nice walk rialto comfortable reception staff friendly helpful breakfast trouble organised gondola ride starting canal near hotel wonderful canals 2 crossings grand canal half price san marco plenty restaurants walking distance catch vaporetto outside door afield stayed venice definitely little gem

Reviews.Title: “So close to the Grand Canal...”
Reviews.Author: Naples64
Reviews.Content: venice stop trip italy looking hotel canal view location perfect san boat stop arrived train walked 15 mins recommend catching boat corner little windows loved able look happening gondolas people delivering furniture etc air conditioning staff incredibly helpful recommendations dinner coffee etc

Reviews.Title: “Nice place not too far from centra Venice”
Reviews.Author: trekker77Norway
Reviews.Content: expect bit 140 venice guess price ok window street quiet guess canal view probably bit expensive minute walk water bus advice buy ticket days stay expensive afterwards travelling boat free walking san marco takes half hour nice times lady welcomed reception nice time explain lot nice restaurants vicinity deal overpriced lot san marco breakfast acceptable coffee horrible compared normal procedure italy yes norway story

HotelInfo.Name: Locanda Ca' San Marcuola
HotelInfo.Address: Cannaregio, 1763, 30121 Venice, Italy
